short_summary: Promotional and advertising printing for government use
description: Production of promotional items such as pens, pencils, printed documents and any other promotional list for government purpose
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

### Title
**Request for Supply Arrangement for Promotional Items**

### Reference Number
WS4246767482-Doc4246796514

### Amendment Number
2

### Publication Date
2023-10-17

### Closing Date and Time (UTC-5)
2024-12-30T14:00:00

### Procurement Category
Goods and Services - Goods

### Procurement Method
Competitive Open Bidding

### Supply Arrangement Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services is seeking to establish Supply Arrangement with qualified suppliers for the provision of promotional items, including high-quality printing and customization services. These items will be used to support federal departments and agencies in their communication projects on an "if and when requested" basis.

Some examples of promotional items include:

* Clothing items
* Office products
* Pens
* Stickers
* Mouse pads
* Water bottles
* Pins
* Mugs

### Period of Supply Arrangement
The period for awarding contracts under the Supply Arrangement is from the date of award to December 30th, 2024.

### Evaluation Criteria
The lowest cost per point will be used as the evaluation criterion.

### Period of Use
The contracting entity requires that the awarded supplier provide the promotional items within the specified timeframe.

### Travel Restrictions
None

### Procurement Contact
For more information or to submit a bid, please contact:

* Maxine Holloway (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [maxine.holloway@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:maxine.holloway@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not Available
* Fax: Not Available

### Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17742591?extsite=MTc3NDI1OTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Attachment
None
